column1: # Issues Total: 213
# Repository: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-js
# Generated: 2025-08-12
issue_title
[BUG]: Failed to load Stripe
Luminosity ratio of the focus indicator on 'x' button is less than required 3:1 ratio on the 'scan ....' popup.
There is no visual label for the form elements (like email, country combo box, mobile number, First and last name) under the 'Pay' tab.
Screen reader is not announcing accessible name for 'Country' combo box available on pay tab.
Luminosity ratio of the focus indicator on 'country' is less than required ratio of 3:1.
Screen reader does not announce the name for info (i) button in windows.
Visual label names are not descriptive for Expiration combo box in windows.
[BUG]: 3D Secure Authentication behind top layer elements
Lack of Cross-Origin-Related HTTP Security Headers
Luminosity ratio of the text is less than required 4.5:1 under the scan 'cash app pay' popup.

It works perfectly when switch in desktop mode (tested with wallet tuto page here on 2 different android devices, same result. Can you please test on your side and advise if a bug or a stripe element limitation ? Thank you !
